ComicInfo.Summary:
Back BlurbThe barbecue is flaming HOT, nd so are the women of Rebeccaland -- grilling their asses and toasting their feet with sensual torture and tears. The recipe calls for lactating breast milk and cookies decorated with pussy-juice and pee, making 'em finger-lickin' good indeed. This big collection of Rebecca's features his patented beautiful moms and daughters out in the open, smack-dab in the middle of suburbia. Damn all those secrets kept behind closed doors -- this is Rebeccaland, with girls doing girls on girls in girls. Suburbia without Rebecca would be a very mundane place. All hail Rebecca!
